body_html:
Received the same error using a GTX 1080 ti on Ubuntu 16.04 while working through the MNIST tutorial.

`

init = tf.global_variables_initializer()
sess = tf.Session()
2017-07-14 20:32:21.186294: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1030] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pci bus id: 0000:65:00.0)
sess.run(init)
2017-07-14 20:32:34.666827: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_FAILED
2017-07-14 20:32:34.666873: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
Aborted (core dumped)
`

Received the same error using a GTX 1080 ti on Ubuntu 16.04 while working through the MNIST tutorial.
`



init = tf.global_variables_initializer()
sess = tf.Session()

body:
Received the same error using a GTX 1080 ti on Ubuntu 16.04 while working through the MNIST tutorial.

`
>>> init = tf.global_variables_initializer()
>>> sess = tf.Session()
2017-07-14 20:32:21.186294: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1030] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pci bus id: 0000:65:00.0)
>>> sess.run(init)
2017-07-14 20:32:34.666827: E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_LAUNCH_FAILED
2017-07-14 20:32:34.666873: F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:203] Unexpected Event status: 1
Aborted (core dumped)
`
